class_notes: Class meets in person Wed 3:00 - 4:50 and has an additional, asynchronous component. GH CHD student enrollment through March 21. GH (non CHD Concentration), GEH, and GLEPI student enrollment begins 6:00am March 22nd and goes through through March 23rd. All other MPH/MSPH may enroll beginning March 24.
course_description: An introduction to Community-based Participatory Action Research (CBPAR), and similar research approaches ones that are community-based and community-centered, participatory in their inclusion of community members as protagonists, and action-oriented in the sense that they explicitly seek to promote change. Students will develop familiarity with a range of classical and innovative research approaches, including assets-based approaches such as appreciative inquiry and critical approaches such as autoethnography. The course will be divided roughly in half, with the first half being more instructor-guided and the second half, student-generated and led.
schedule_location: W 3pm-4:50pm in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R344
